English: New History of the Yuan Dynasty, completed by Ke Shaomin `柯~`劭~`忞~[Ke1 Shao4 min2] in 1920, sometimes listed as one of the 24 Dynastic Histories `二十四史~[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3]
